languages.text: Еще недавно величаво возвышавшаяся перед Дворцом Наместника, статуя Императора была повалена ошалевшей толпой и разбита вдребезги. Стиснутый меж ее останками, догорает остов трона, с которого вершила свой суд Инцендия.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Барк о том, как бысто пришел хаос на футфолл, сломанную статую и горящий трон.

languages.text: The towering statue of the Emperor that used to stand majestically in front of the Liege's palace was toppled and shattered by a rampaging crowd. The charred husk of the throne that formerly served as the seat of Incendia's court is lodged between its remains.
languages.original_text: Еще недавно величаво возвышавшаяся перед Дворцом Наместника, статуя Императора была повалена ошалевшей толпой и разбита вдребезги. Стиснутый меж ее останками, догорает остов трона, с которого вершила свой суд Инцендия.

traits.locale_text: The tall statue of the Emperor that used to stand majestically in front of the Liege's palace was toppled and shattered by a rampaging crowd. The charred husk of the throne that formerly served as the seat of Incendia's court is lodged between its remains.

languages.text: かつてリージュの宮殿の前に威風堂々と立っていた皇帝の巨大な像は、暴徒によって倒され、粉々に破壊された。以前はインセンディアの宮廷の座席として機能していた玉座の焦げた外殻は、その残骸の間に挟まっている。
languages.original_text: The towering statue of the Emperor that used to stand majestically in front of the Liege's palace was toppled and shattered by a rampaging crowd. The charred husk of the throne that formerly served as the seat of Incendia's court is lodged between its remains.

traits.locale_text: かつてリージュの宮殿の前に威風堂々と立っていた皇帝の巨大な像は、暴徒によって倒され、粉々に破壊された。以前はインセンディアの宮廷の座席として機能していた玉座の焦げた外殻は、その残骸の間に挟まっている。

languages.text: La majestueuse statue de l'Empereur, qui se dressait autrefois devant le palais du suzerain, a été renversée et détruite par la foule en furie. Il ne reste qu'une carcasse calcinée de la structure qui lui servait de trône, là où siégeait le tribunal d'Incendia.
languages.original_text: The towering statue of the Emperor that used to stand majestically in front of the Liege's palace was toppled and shattered by a rampaging crowd. The charred husk of the throne that formerly served as the seat of Incendia's court is lodged between its remains.

traits.locale_text: La majestueuse statue de l'Empereur, qui se dressait autrefois devant le palais du suzerain, a été renversée et détruite par la foule en furie. Il ne reste qu'une carcasse calcinée de la structure qui lui servait de trône, là où siégeait le tribunal d'Incendia.

languages.text: 原本威严地耸立在总督府前面的帝皇雕像，如今已经被肆虐的人群推倒，砸得粉碎。因森蒂娅原本审判时坐的椅子，如今已经被砸成了碎片，烧得焦黑，胡乱地丢在粉碎的帝皇雕像之间。
languages.original_text: The towering statue of the Emperor that used to stand majestically in front of the Liege's palace was toppled and shattered by a rampaging crowd. The charred husk of the throne that formerly served as the seat of Incendia's court is lodged between its remains.

traits.locale_text: 原本威严地耸立在总督府前面的帝皇雕像，如今已经被肆虐的人群推倒，砸得粉碎。因森蒂娅原本审判时坐的椅子，如今已经被砸成了碎片，烧得焦黑，胡乱地丢在粉碎的帝皇雕像之间。

languages.text: Die gewaltige Statue des Imperators, die vormals majestätisch vor dem Palast des Lehnsherrn stand, wurde von einer tobenden Menge umgestürzt und zerstört. Zwischen den Überresten befindet sich noch der verkohlte Thron, auf dem früher Incendia Hof gehalten hat.
languages.original_text: The towering statue of the Emperor that used to stand majestically in front of the Liege's palace was toppled and shattered by a rampaging crowd. The charred husk of the throne that formerly served as the seat of Incendia's court is lodged between its remains.

traits.locale_text: Die gewaltige Statue des Imperators, die vormals majestätisch vor dem Palast des Lehnsherrn stand, wurde von einer tobenden Menge umgestürzt und zerstört. Zwischen den Überresten befindet sich noch der verkohlte Thron, auf dem früher Incendia Hof gehalten hat.

languages.text: La imponente estatua del Emperador que solía erigirse frente al palacio del Señor fue víctima de una multitud desbocada. El armazón carbonizado del trono, que antaño servía de sede a la corte de Incendia, se halla entre los restos.
languages.original_text: The towering statue of the Emperor that used to stand majestically in front of the Liege's palace was toppled and shattered by a rampaging crowd. The charred husk of the throne that formerly served as the seat of Incendia's court is lodged between its remains.

traits.locale_text: La imponente estatua del Emperador que solía erigirse frente al palacio del Señor fue víctima de una multitud desbocada. El armazón carbonizado del trono, que antaño servía de sede a la corte de Incendia, se halla entre los restos.

languages.text: Eskiden Emîr'in Sarayı'nın önünde görkemli bir şekilde duran İmparator heykeli, öfkeli kalabalık tarafından devrilip paramparça edilmiş. İncendia'nın hükmettiği tahtın yanmış iskeleti ise heykelin kalıntıları arasında yer alıyor.
languages.original_text: The towering statue of the Emperor that used to stand majestically in front of the Liege's palace was toppled and shattered by a rampaging crowd. The charred husk of the throne that formerly served as the seat of Incendia's court is lodged between its remains.
